Class LatLong

  • java.lang.Object
    • microsoft.hawaii.sdk.PathPredictionService.ServiceContracts.LatLong

  • public class LatLong
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents a latitude and longitude

      • LatLongEqual

        public static boolean LatLongEqual(LatLong llA,
                   LatLong llB)
        Determines if two latlongs refer to the same location
        Parameters:
        llA - the first location
        llB - the second location
        Returns:
        boolean true if the two latlongs are the same, false otherwise

      • LatLongNotEqual

        public static boolean LatLongNotEqual(LatLong llA,
                      LatLong llB)
        Determines if two latlongs are NOT the same location
        Parameters:
        llA - the first location
        llB - the second location
        Returns:
        boolean true if the two latlongs differ, false otherwise

      • DistanceMeters

        public float DistanceMeters(LatLong latLong)
        DistanceMeters Calculates the distance between the current LatLong and the supplied LatLong. Uses Haversine formula from http://mathforum.org/library/drmath/view/51879.html
        Parameters:
        latLong - The remote location to calculate the distance to
        Returns:
        float The distance in meters between the two locations
